name: Casual
description: A source preset for the Randomizer. Meant as a more relaxed experience compared to the 'Safe' preset. Requires no speedrun or glitch knowledge for completion.
author: 3snow_p7im
setz
soba

name: Safe
description: A source preset for the Randomizer. Meant to mimic the complexity of the original game by having nine layers of complexity. Requires no speedrun or glitch knowledge for completion.
author: 3snow_p7im
setz
soba

name: Adventure
description: Meant for players who want to see more of the castle.
author: 3snow_p7im

name: O.G.
description: The first Randomizer preset. Only randomizes relic locations and item locations. Soul of Bat, Form of Mist and Jewel of Open are guaranteed to be in first castle.
author: 3snow_p7im

name: Guarded O.G.
description: The best preset for trying out the SOTN Randomizer. Utilizes our 'guarded' relic locations but Gold ring, Silver ring, Holy glasses and Spike Breaker are in the same locations as the original game.  Soul of Bat, Form of Mist and Jewel of Open are guaranteed to be in first castle. You can find more details on the 'guarded' checks at https://symphonyrando.fun/locations
author: TalicZealot

name: Sequence Breaker
description: Requires knowledge of movement mechanics used to sequence break in the game such as transformation-enabled dive kicks and thrust sword techniques.
author: 3snow_p7im

name: Lycanthrope
description: Start with all wolf relics. MP consumption is greatly reduced when in wolf form. Death skip is intended with a long wolf run.
author: 3snow_p7im

name: Warlock
description: Start with high intelligence and Form of Mist. Drastically reduced MP cost for spells. Mist is free.
author: 3snow_p7im

name: Nimble
description: A fast, complexity-focused preset. Start with Soul of Bat, Leap Stone, Gravity Boots, Duplicator, Manna prism, and Buffalo star.
author: 3snow_p7im

name: Expedition
description: To be discontinued in the near future. Start with the initial load out from the 'Nimble' preset but with the Equipment relic extension. Reverse Library Cards are enabled with Down + Input to activate. Stopwatches are guaranteed under the statues with Cube of Zoe.
author: eldri7ch
MottZilla

name: Bat-Master
description: Soul of Bat moves faster and can open doors. Soul of Bat is guaranteed within the first castle. All Bat abilities and upgrades are greatly enhanced. Hold Triangle to move bat at original speed.  Bat Familiar levels faster.
author: MT_Fun
MottZilla

name: Glitch Remastered
description: A preset for people who love glitches in the game. Requires knowledge of most glitches and exploits to become proficient at solving these seeds. Avoids memory corruption and lengthy wolf rising.
author: romscout
DerDrach
eldri7ch
MottZilla

name: Scavenger
description: No enemy drops. Equipment must be found in item locations throughout the map.
author: 3snow_p7im

name: Empty hand
description: April Fools Preset released on April 1st, 2020. No equipment or items challenge mode.
author: 3snow_p7im

name: Gem farmer
description: April Fools Preset released on April 1st, 2021. All progression must be purchased from the librarian.
author: 3snow_p7im

name: Third castle
description: April Fools Preset released on April 1st, 2022. Randomizes tileset data producing intense pixel gore.
author: 3snow_p7im

name: Rat race
description: April Fools Preset released on April 1st, 2023. Just trying to make a buck.
author: 3snow_p7im

name: Magic Mirror
description: Use a Magic Mirror (X + Triangle; Replaces Holy Glasses) to move between the castles. Significant map changes to add new complexity. Warp room in entrance goes to Outer Wall at the start.
author: eldri7ch
MottZilla

name: Leg Day
description: A technical preset where you start with Leap Stone with infinite air jumps. Back dash lasts longer and grants invincibility. Many transformation and movement relics are removed to emphasize new techniques.
author: MT_Fun
MottZilla

name: Boss Rush
description: Boss Rush Mode featuring safe rooms after every three bosses and low to medium powered equipment. Intended as an 'Arcade Mode' featuring many easter eggs.
author: MottZilla
eldri7ch

name: Aperture
description: Opens several shortcuts and all teleporters but changes the layout of many rooms in the castle to maintain complexity. Shaft and Dracula are hidden behind the Portal Spell (Replaces Faerie Scroll) which must be collected after acquiring all five Vlad Relics.
author: eldri7ch
MottZilla
Wecoc

name: Big Toss
description: Bat and Wolf relics beyond Soul are removed, and any amount of damage causes a 'big toss', launching Alucard across the screen. New movement intended with the Toadstool food item.
author: Wecoc
eldri7ch
MottZilla

name: Bounty Hunter
description: The Vlad Relics are dropped by 5 random enemies throughout the castle and the player must collect familiar cards to find out which enemies have the relics. Relic placement requires the Bounty Hunter Tool. App URL: https://github.com/MottZilla/BountyHunterTool
author: eldri7ch
MottZilla

name: Bounty Hunter TC
description: Bounty Hunter variant. Vlad drop rates are much higher, Familiar Cards are required before the drop is unlocked. Requires the Bounty Hunter Tool. App URL: https://github.com/MottZilla/BountyHunterTool
author: eldri7ch
MottZilla

name: Hitman
description: Bounty Hunter variant. Start with all five Familiar Cards so you know your targets. Requires the Bounty Hunter Tool. App URL: https://github.com/MottZilla/BountyHunterTool
author: eldri7ch
MottZilla

name: Chaos Lite
description: April Fools Preset Released on April 1st, 2024. A child of the original Chaos. Requires the Bounty Hunter Tool. App URL: https://github.com/MottZilla/BountyHunterTool
author: 3snow_p7im
eldri7ch
MottZilla

name: Beyond
description: Replaces many items with new ones and adds the Castle Key (Replaces Faerie Scroll) which unlocks the Warp Rooms.
author: Forat Negre
Wecoc
eldri7ch

name: Breach
description: Utilizes the Aperture model including Portal Spell and map changes, but also gives the player all five Vlad Relics along with the initial load out from the 'Nimble' preset. Speed your way to the Portal Spell and defat Dracula as fast as possible.
author: eldri7ch
MottZilla
Wecoc

name: Grand Tour
description: To be discontinued in the near future. Meant for players who want to see more unique locations of the castle.
author: eldri7ch
MottZilla

name: Crash Course
description: Start with the initial load out from the 'Nimble' preset but with the Scenic relic extension. Reverse Library Cards are enabled with Down + Input to activate. Stopwatches are guaranteed under the statues with Cube of Zoe.
author: eldri7ch
MottZilla

name: Any Percent
description: Requires knowledge of movement mechanics and glitches used in Any% speedruns. Death skip intended but not necessary. Richter Skip and Relic Skip are required to beat the game.  Soul of Wolf and Soul of Bat are guaranteed to be in first castle.
author: 3snow_p7im
Dr4gonBlitz
eldri7ch

name: Lookingglass
description: To be discontinued in the near future. Use a Magic Mirror (X + Triangle; Replaces Holy Glasses) to move between the castles. Significant map changes to add new complexity. Warp room in entrance goes to Outer Wall at the start.
author: eldri7ch
MottZilla

name: Skinwalker
description: To be discontinued in the near future. Includes all changes from Aperture, discounts MP costs on transformations and guarantees early access to at least one transformation before leaving first castle.
author: Zako
eldri7ch
MottZilla
Wecoc

name: Summoner
description: Utilize Level 99 Familiars and Summon Items like Monster Vials and Sword of Dawn to defeat your foes. Many items have had their damage scaling fixed.
author: eldri7ch
MottZilla

name: Agonize 2020
description: Emulates Agonize Preset from 2020. Fixed locations for various relics to 'Maximize backtracking'.  Soul of Wolf, Soul of Bat, Form of Mist and Jewel of Open are guaranteed to be in first castle.
author: 3snow_p7im
eldri7ch
Crazy4blades

name: Safe Season 2
description: A popular variant that emulates how Safe felt in Season 2. Requires no speedrun or glitch knowledge for completion.
author: 3snow_p7im
setz
soba

name: Open
description: Start in a random location and opens all shortcuts and all teleporters.
author: TalicZealot
eldri7ch
MottZilla
Wecoc

name: Brawler
description: A challenge preset to get more accustomed to the Fist type weapons, most spells are removed as are almost all swords.
author: Crazy4blades
Mottzilla

name: First Castle
description: Shortcuts are unlocked in this preset which takes place entirely in the first castle. Alucard can also get 2 Library cards from the prologue if played right. Save Richter once you have all five Vlad Relics to teleport directly to Shaft / Dracula.
author: SacredLucy
MottZilla

name: Lucky Sevens
description: Start with 77 in all stats, 7 random relics, and 77% chance for uncommon and rare drops. Skips prolgue. Open all shortcuts and some teleporters in the second castle. Enemies have a small chance to drop relics.
author: eldri7ch

name: Bingo
description: Bot-only preset. Created for the 2024 Bingo Tournament. Does not randomize relics but randomizes items.
author: Dr4gonBlitz
eldri7ch

name: Sight-Seer
description: A simple, no mess preset using the Extended relic locations.
author: 3snow_p7im
eldri7ch

name: Cursed Night
description: Alucard is cursed at the start of the subweapon-focused preset. Utilize various Subweapons acquired through relics and cycled with L2. Coral circlet removes the curse.
author: Bob Sagget
Forat Negre

name: Spellbound
description: A high-complexity preset which locks spells behind familiar cards. Intended to emphasize better non-magical combat in the early game. Relics unkown until collected.
author: MottZilla
JupiterClimb

name: Mobility
description: Start with all movement relics and all transformations with discounted MP costs. Significant map changes keep complexity slightly higher. Also adds many randomizations including Enemy Stats and Shop Prices.
author: 3snow_p7im
eldri7ch
MottZilla
Wecoc
